name: Art + DIY Electronics
author: Garnet Hertz
description: A systematic theory of DIY electronic culture, drawn from a century of artists who have independently built creative technologies.

name: Playing Oppression: The Legacy of Conquest and Empire in Colonialist Board Games
author: Mary Flanagan and Mikael Jakobsson
description: A striking analysis of popular board games' roots in imperialist reasoning â€” and why the future of play depends on reckoning with it.
